channel.title: Things that can help you get your account bak if banned :)
channel.description:
OK, well, here it is: If you have been banned because of offensive language, in the ban appeal write this: Dear, Jagex
I'm sorry for what i've done. I know it was wrong and feel terrible towards the user i abused. If you decide to just give me a warning on this i would be grateful and can assure you nothing like this will occurr again. I feel it's my duty to apologize to the user i abused as i may have hurt their feelings, and made them upset. I know i wouldn't like to be spoken to in the way i did.
If you have been banned for Item Scamming write this: Dear, Jagex
I'm terribly sorry for trying to do this, i know it was wrong but it got the better of my everyone was doing it, so i thought i would give it ago. I've totally learnt my lesson and won't even think of trying this again. Please keep in mind that i only tried to scam, i didn't actually scam anyone but i know that doesn't justify anything and i was in the wrong.
Thank You.
I will get some more in the furure...:D
Freshly Added:
I got some more guys :P. Here they are:
If you have been banned for Password Scamming put this in your appeal:
Jagex i didn't do anything wrong. Someone has been logging onto my account everyday for the last month or so. But they can't guess my bank pin. Every time i log in my bank pin has tryed to be deleted. I keep changing my password but they keep guessing it. I've scanned my computer and it has no viruses please help. And please don't add to the situation by banning me =(
Thank You.
If you have been banned for Bug Abuse type this in your ban appeal:
Dear, Jagex
I'm sorry for doing this but i think it was a mis-understanding, i come across that bug accidently. and i was so excited of what i did i tried to do it again, but it didn't work. I was trying to figure out how i did it exactly but i couldn't re-do it. so i am sorry for doing it although it was an accident and i couldn't repeat it, and i gained nothing out of it.
Thank You.
Thats all i got for now :D More will come later ;D :P

item.title: Things that can help you get your account bak if banned :)
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

[quote=“Brad_c, post:8, topic:85908”][quote author=Fasih link=topic=126026.msg1226765#msg1226765 date=1177733434]
OK, well, here it is:
If you have been banned because of offensive language, in the ban appeal write this:
Dear, Jagex

I’m sorry for what i’ve done. I know it was wrong and feel terrible towards the user i abused. If you decide to just give me a warning on this i would be grateful and can assure you nothing like this will occurr again. I feel it’s my duty to apologize to the user i abused as i may have hurt their feelings, and made them upset. I know i wouldn’t like to be spoken to in the way i did.

If you have been banned for Item Scamming write this:
Dear, Jagex

I’m terribly sorry for trying to do this, i know it was wrong but it got the better of my everyone was doing it, so i thought i would give it ago. I’ve totally learnt my lesson and won’t even think of trying this again. Please keep in mind that i only tried to scam, i didn’t actually scam anyone but i know that doesn’t justify anything and i was in the wrong.

Thank You.

I will get some more in the furure…

Freshly Added:

I got some more guys :P. Here they are:

If you have been banned for Password Scamming put this in your appeal:

Jagex i didn’t do anything wrong. Someone has been logging onto my account everyday for the last month or so. But they can’t guess my bank pin. Every time i log in my bank pin has tryed to be deleted. I keep changing my password but they keep guessing it. I’ve scanned my computer and it has no viruses please help. And please don’t add to the situation by banning me =(

Thank You.

If you have been banned for Bug Abuse type this in your ban appeal:

Dear, Jagex

I’m sorry for doing this but i think it was a mis-understanding, i come across that bug accidently. and i was so excited of what i did i tried to do it again, but it didn’t work. I was trying to figure out how i did it exactly but i couldn’t re-do it. so i am sorry for doing it although it was an accident and i couldn’t repeat it, and i gained nothing out of it.

Thank You.

Thats all i got for now More will come later ;D

[/quote]

-.- Saw this on Scyth yesterday…[/quote]

The post date is over a week ago.

-.- Saw this on moparisthebest two weeks ago…

Read full topic

item.title: Things that can help you get your account bak if banned :)
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:5, topic:85908”][quote author=Aftermath link=topic=126026.msg1226800#msg1226800 date=1177733715]
Don’t ask for rep.

They just automatically decline my appeals. I’ve had something like 100+ accounts banned.
[/quote]

Was that through Aryan? I used about…15 accounts with Aryan, and only four got banned. I still have all the others. Flax, Ore, Rune Ess. I forgot the passwords though /wrists. At least 3M sitting on all of them.[/quote]

Thats a shame!

Read full topic
